channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: WWE's Greatest Moments
channel.desc: Throughout time, one WWE Superstar continues to define the word charisma: "Macho Man" Randy Savage. With his flashy outfits, unmistakable voice, and signature moves, the "Macho Man" is indeed the cream of the crop. Relive some of Randy's most savage moments including winning the WWE Championship at WrestleMania 4, the Career-Ending Match at WrestleMania 7 against the Ultimate Warrior, his unforgettable wedding to Miss Elizabeth and much more!
